0.Name: PocketKnife
0.Description: This is a PocketKnife you have from home. You can use it to cut things.

1.Name: First Aid Kit
1.Description: This is a First Aid Kit. You can use it to to heal yourself and fix some status effects

2.Name: Axe
2.Description: This is an axe. You can use it to cut wood, or perhaps for something else...

3.Name: Flashlight
3.Description: This is a flashlight. You can use it to light the way, or perhaps for something else...

4.Name: Rifle
4.Description: This is a rifle. Pow Pow.

5.Name: Camo Clothes
5.Description: These are Camo Clothes. They may be useful for hiding in the wilderness

6.Name: Knife
6.Description: This is a knife. Larger than your pocketknife, it might be useful to cut larger things or defend yourself.

7.Name: Matches
7.Description: These are matches. You can use these to light a fire.

8.Name: Water Bottle (Empty)
8.Description: This is an empty water bottle. Maybe you should fill it up.

9.Name: Water Bottle (Dirty)
9.Description: This water bottle is filled with dirty water. You should clean it somehow before you drink it.

10.Name: Water Bottle (Clean)
10.Description: This water bottle is filled with clean water. You could drink this and be fine.

11.Name: Rope
11.Description: This is rope. It might be useful when trying to survive

12.Name: Marshmallow
12.Description: This is a marshmallow. These taste delicious, but would be even better cooked.

13.Name: Marshmallow (Cooked)
13.Description: This is a cooked marshmallow. Delicious!

14.Name: Tarp
14.Description: This is a tarp. It could be useful for staying safe from the elements

15.Name: American BitterSweet
15.Description: This is a berry. They are orange.

16.Name: Blueberries
16.Description: These berries are small circular and of course, blue.

17.Name: Blackberries
17.Description: These berries are small and black. They look safe to eat.

18.Name: Strawberries
18.Description: These are strawberries. You know what a strawberry is don't you?

19.Name: Cottoneaster
19.Description: These berries are small and red.

20.Name: Yew
20.Description: These berries are small and red. Also, badgers can eat them.

21.Name: Cooking Pot (Empty)
21.Description: This is an empty cooking pot. This could be useful.

22.Name: Cooking Pot (Dirty)
22.Description: This cooking pot is filled with dirty water. You probably shouldn't consume this just yet.

23.Name: Cooking Pot (Clean)
23.Description: This cooking pot is filled with clean water. This is safe to drink.

24.Name: Bucket (Empty)
24.Description: This bucket is empty. It could be useful for carrying something...

25.Name: Bucket (Dirty)
25.Description: This bucket is filled with dirty water. You should avoid drinking it for now.

26.Name: Bucket (Clean)
26.Description: This bucket is filled with clean water. This is now safe to drink!

27.Name: Burnt Lasagna
27.Description: This is a constant reminder of how you burnt down your house. You can never drop this item.
